p: Compared with PIH alone, PIH-gold nanorods mediate tenfold higher HR1 inhibition and consequent inhibition of HR1/HR2 complex (6-HB)-mediated membrane fusion of MERS-CoV, in addition to related potential biostability and biocompatibility in vitro and in vivo [ 148]. Recently, a peptide inhibitor, which is extracted from ACE2 and shows conformational matching to RBD of SARS-CoV-2, was shown to be conjugated to surface of NPs and molecular dynamics simulations proved its blocking activity against SARS-CoV-2 [ 149]. Another nanostructure, boronic acid-functionalized QDs interfered with S protein, preventing the entry of Î±-CoV (229E) [ 12]. QDs easily enter cells and prevent replication of virus [ 12].
